282070.「あたしは 改造屋だよ！\n 塔の中で手に入る 素材をもってきてくれたら\n あ:
I'm a modder! Bring me materials you can find in the tower, and I'll modify your equipment... You can add alchemical effects
to your equipment, evolve it into another of the same type, or even convert it... You'll lose all the materials you used in the
process, so think carefully before you choose... Well, then...

282071.「私は 強化屋だよ。\n お持ちの装備を同じ種類の 少し強い装備に\n 強化する:
I can enhance... I can enhance your equipment with a slightly stronger version of the same type... But I can only enhance it once every
time I see you. You'll have to choose... Okay, well...

282072.「ここは 改造屋だよ。\n あたしに 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_s:
This is the Remodeling Shop. What can I do
for you?
<select_se_off>
Modify Weapon/Shield
Modify Armor
Modify Accessories
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

282073.「他に 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_se_off>\n武器か盾を改造:
Anything else I can do for you?
<select_se_off>
Modify Weapon/Shield
Modify Armor
Modify Accessories
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

282074.「あら？ 装備品を 持っていないみたいね。\n 装備品を 手に入れたら また来て:
What? You don't seem to have any equipment.
Come back when you get some.<end>

282075.「何について 聞きたいのかな？\n<select_se_off>\n改造屋って？:
What do you want to ask me?
<select_se_off>
Remodeling?
Alchemy Slots
Slot Types
Evolve/Convert
<select_end>
<break>

282076.「付けられる 錬金効果には\n 装備しているあいだ 追加のスキルを\n 覚えるこ:
Some of the alchemical effects you can add will allow you to learn additional skills while equipped. The number of slots you can
add is limited, but you can learn several skills with a single effect. You can check what skills you can learn when you attach an
alchemy effect, so you can find the one that suits you best.

282077.「スキル以外の 錬金効果は\n スロットごとに 決まった種類の中から\n 好きな:
Other than skills, each slot has a specific alchemy effect that you can choose from. However, the strength of the effect varies,
and you won't know how strong it will be until you add it... You can see a list of possible strengths when you select an effect,
for reference.

282078.「武器や防具を より高い装備ランクの\n 別の武器や防具に 作りかえることを\n:
When a weapon or armor is replaced by another weapon or armor of a higher equipment rank, it's called "evolution. Transforming a weapon
or armor into another weapon or armor with the same equipment rank as the original is called... Evolution and Transmutation are
only for weapons and armor of the same lineage, like a one-handed sword to a one- handed sword... If the number or type of
alchemy effect slots changes due to evolution or transformation, some alchemy effects cannot be transferred.

282079.「素材とゴールドをつかって 持っている装備品を\n 同じ装備ランクの 別の装備に:
You can use materials and gold to convert your equipment into other equipment of the same rank... But the equipment must be of the
same type. You can't convert a shield to a two-handed sword or vice versa. Also, if you change the shape of the slot, some alchemy
effects won't be carried over, so be careful...

282082.「改造する ベース装備を選択しろ。\n<break>: Select the base equipment to modify.<break>

282083.「ちょっと！ この装備品は\n ロックされているみたいだよ。\n 解除するか 別:
Wait! This piece of equipment appears to be
locked. Either unlock it, or select another
piece of equipment.<end>

282084.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n これ以:
Huh? <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> can't be
enhanced any further. You'll have to choose
another piece of equipment.<end>

282085.「この アイテムはあたしには\n 改造できないよ。\n<break>: I don't think I can modify this item.<break>

282086.「<%sL_SENTAKU_ITEM>だな。\n どのメニューにするんだ？\n<:
<%sL_SENTAKU_ITEM... Which menu are you going
to use?
<select_se_off>
Grant skills (sets)
Granting alchemy
Evolve your equipment
Transforming equipment
<select_end>
<break>

282088.「あら？ お金が足りないみたい。\n ゴールドを準備してから また来てね。\n<:
Huh? You're short on money. Come back when
you get more Gold.<end>

282089.「あら？ 素材が足りないみたい。\n 素材を準備してから また来てね。\n<en:
Huh? You're short on materials. Come back
when you get more.<end>

282091.「この効果を セットするけど\n 本当に いいかな？\n<yesno_2><br:
I'll set this effect. Are you sure
you want to do this?<yesno_2><break>

282092.「わかったわ。\n そこで 少し待っててちょうだい……。\n ふんふんふふん！！:
Got it. Just give me one second...
Mmm-hmm-hmmmmm!<se Joutyu_SE 40>
<break>

282096.「そうそう 今回は 特別うまくできたから\n ゴールドは 無料にしておいたよ！\:
Oh yeah! I did super well this time! The
Gold cost is on me!
<end>

282097.「どうも ありがとう！\n また来てくれたら うれしいな。\n<end>:
Thank you very much! I'd be happy to see
you again.<end>

282098.「やめとくの？\n 気が変わったら また話しかけてね。\n<end>:
Don't want to? Feel free to come back if
you change your mind.<end>

282099.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>は\n 今 装:
Oh? It looks like <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> is what you're currently equipped with, but are you sure you
want to convert this?

282100.「<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>から\n <%sL_M:
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> into
<%sL_MORAU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum2>? After
being converted, it'll look like this.<end>

282101.「本当に 作り変えて いいかな？\n<yesno_2><break>:
You want me to evolve this?
<yesno_2><break>

282102.「錬金スロットは そのまま継承するぞ。\n<break>:
The alchemy slot will be inherited.
<break>

282103.「この装備は 錬金スロットの形が違うから\n そのまま 錬金効果の継承は できな:
This equipment has a different shape of alchemy slot, so it can't inherit alchemy effects. Select the effect you want to
transfer...

282104.「継承できない 錬金スロットがまだあるな。\n もうひとつあるな 移したいモノを:
I can't inherit it. The alchemy slot is
still... There's one more thing. You can
choose what you want to transfer.<break>

285722.「あら？ スキルをつけられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品を:
What? It looks like you don't have any
equipment that can add skills... You'll have
to come back when you have the equipment!<bw_break>

285723.「あら？ 錬金効果をつけられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品:
What? It looks like you don't have any
equipment that can add alchemical effects...
Come back when you have the equipment!<bw_break>

285724.「あら？ 進化や変換ができる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品を:
What? You don't seem to have any equipment
that can evolve or transform... You'll have
to come back when you have the equipment!<bw_break>

285725.「あら？ この装備は 進化や変換をすることが\n できないみたい。\n 別の装備:
What? This equipment can't be evolved or
converted. I'll have to choose another one...<end>

285726.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n スキ:
Huh? You can't add skills to
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>... I'm going to
have to choose another piece of equipment.<end>

285727.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n 錬金:
Huh? You can't add alchemical effects to
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>... I'll have to
pick another one...<end>

285728.「選んだ場所に 新しく スキルをつけたり\n 今のスキルを 上書きしちゃうよ。\:
You can add new skills to your chosen
location, or overwrite your existing
skills... Where do I set them?<break>

285729.「選んだ場所に 新しく 錬金効果をつけたり\n 今の錬金効果を 上書きしちゃうよ:
You can add a new alchemy effect to the
selected location, or overwrite the current
alchemy effect. Where do I set it?<break>

285730.「あら？ そのスキルは\n もう セットされてるみたいだよ。\n<end>:
What? It looks like your skills are already
set.<end>

285731.「この効果を セットするけど\n 本当に いいかな？\n<yesno2><clo:
I'm going to set this effect. Are you sure
you want to do this?<yesno2><close>

285732.「本当に 変換しても いいかな？\n<yesno2><close>:
You'd like me to convert this?
<yesno2><close>

285733.「上手く 進化できたよ！\n 進化した装備は 今よりも良い錬金効果を\n つけ直:
I was able to evolve it successfully! You can
reapply better alchemical effects to your
evolved equipment, so please check it out!<bw_break>

285734.「上手く 変換できたよ！\n 付けられる錬金効果が 変わっているから\n 確認し:
I was able to convert it successfully! The
alchemical effects you can add have changed,
so please check it out!<bw_break>

285735.「この装備は 錬金スロットの形が違うから\n そのまま 錬金効果の継承は できな:
This equipment has a different shape of alchemy slot, so it can't inherit alchemy effects. Select the effect you want to
transfer...

285736.「まだ 未選択のスロットが あるみたいだよ。\n 全てのスロットで 継承する効果:
It looks like there are still some slots

effects to inherit for all slots.<end>

286109.「ここは 改造屋だよ。\n あたしに 何か用はあるのかな？\n<select_s:

286719.「あら？ そこはスキル専用のスロットだから\n 錬金効果は つけられないみたい。:
Huh? That's a dedicated slot for skills, so
you can't add alchemical effects there.
You'll have to choose another location...<br_break>

286720.「あら？ そこは錬金効果専用のスロットだから\n スキルは つけられないみたい。:
What? That slot is for alchemical effects
only. You can't add skills to it. I'll choose
another place...<br_break>

287407.「スキルをセットするんだね。\n どの装備に つけたいのかな？ \n<end>:

287408.「錬金効果をセットするんだね。\n どの装備に つけたいのかな？ \n<end>:
Set the alchemy effect... Which one do you
want to put on your equipment?<end>

287409.「進化や変換をしたい 装備を選んでね。\n<end>:

287410.「どんな効果を 付けたいの？\n<end>: What effect do you want to have?<end>

287475.「錬金効果が セットできたよ！\n 気に入ってくれると うれしいな！:
I've set up the alchemical effects! I hope
you like it!

Set the alchemy effect... Which one do you

287645.「ほかに 錬金効果をセットしたい\n 装備はあるかな？\n<end>:
Do you have any other equipment that you'd
like to set alchemical effects on?<end>

287646.「あら？ 錬金効果を付けられる装備品を\n 持っていないみたいだね。\n 装備品:
What? You don't seem to have any equipment that can add alchemical effects... You'll have to come back when you have the
equipment!

287647.「あら？ <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>には\n 錬金:
Huh? You can't add alchemical effects to
<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>... I'll have to
pick another one...<end>

287648.「錬金効果を付けたい 場所を選んでね。\n 一度 効果を付けても 素材があれば\:
Choose which slot to apply the alchemy effect.
You can use the same effect multiple times so
long as you have the needed materials.
<break>

287651.「<%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum>から\n <%sL_M:
From <%sL_BASE_ITEM><%sM_plusnum> into
<%sL_MORAU_ITEM><%sM_plusnum2>? When it
evolves, it looks like this...<end>

287652.「本当に 進化させて いいかな？\n<yesno2><close>: Are you sure you want me to evolve?<yesno2><close>

288282.「持っている装備品に 錬金効果をつけたり\n 新しい別の武器や防具に 進化させた:
You can add alchemical effects to your equipment, evolve it into new weapons and armor, and even convert it! You'll need
materials and gold to modify... You can find out what kind of materials you'll need in the tower equipment list in the Tower Handbook...

288283.「錬金効果枠の 種類について説明するね。\n まず 黄色いマルは スキルを使える:
I'll explain the different types of alchemy effect slots... The first thing you need to know is that the yellow mark is a special
alchemy effect that allows you to use skills! However, if you remove your equipment, you won't be able to use your skills, so be
careful... The red ribbon increases your strength, HP, and other abilities. The orange triangle increases damage and the power of
special moves... The green diamond increases the power of attributes and attributes... The blue squares have an effect when you attack
or act. For armor, it's resistance to abnormalities... And finally, the purple five... The alchemy effect slots, found only
on accessories, allow for special alchemy effects... There are differences between different types of weapons and armor, so
you'll have to experiment!

288803.「やったね！\n 一番いい錬金効果が セットできたよ！: You did it! I've set the best alchemy effect!
